title.rendered: PROFESSIONAL AIRCRAFT ACCESSORIES SIGNS LANDING GEAR OVERHAUL AGREEMENT WITH LUFTHANSA CITYLINE

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories and Lufthansa CityLine GmbH have signed a long-term service agreement for the landing gear overhaul and support of CityLine’s fleet of 28 Bombardier CRJ 900 aircraft.

In 2015, Professional Aircraft Accessories began aiding Lufthansa CityLine GmbH, a German airline carrier and a wholly owned subsidiary of Lufthansa with its CRJ 900 requirements. This new agreement solidifies Professional Aircraft’s support for the next five years. 

“We are honored that Lufthansa CityLine finds value in the support we provide them,” said Jonathan Clarke, vice president and general manager for Professional Aircraft Accessories. “Our team is passionate about providing reliable products and outstanding customer service to our partners and their consumers.”

“We are very pleased to continue the good and reliable cooperation with Professional Aircraft Accessories,” said Manuel Radner, head of supply and contract management for Lufthansa CityLine.

The long-term agreement will run through October 2027.

excerpt.rendered: Professional Aircraft and Lufthansa have signed a long-term service agreement for the LDG overhaul and support of CityLine’s fleet.
